citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ef7a96e3-bf61-46a2-a713-efd7791c9005\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"08\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2014-09-20 au Strait of Georgia Central. Le centre du d\u00e9troit de Georgia est une zone centrale du d\u00e9troit de Georgia. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne. Les capteurs d'oxyg\u00e8ne mesurent la concentration d'oxyg\u00e8ne dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme fixe. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Strait of Georgia Central Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2014-09-20\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/ef7a96e3-bf61-46a2-a713-efd7791c9005?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ef7a96e3-bf61-46a2-a713-efd7791c9005\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"08\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) was deployed on 2014-09-20 at Strait of Georgia Central. Strait of Georgia Central is a central area in the Strait of Georgia. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Strait of Georgia Central Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2014-09-20\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/ef7a96e3-bf61-46a2-a713-efd7791c9005?local=en\"}]

          <mcc:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry (www.epsg-registry.org) or, as downloadable zip files, through IOGP's EPSG home page at www.epsg.org. The geographic coverage of the data is worldwide, but it is stressed that the dataset does not and cannot record all possible geodetic parameters in use around the world.</gco:CharacterString>

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) was deployed on 2014-09-20 at Strait of Georgia Central. Strait of Georgia Central is a central area in the Strait of Georgia. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) a été déployé le 2014-09-20 au Strait of Georgia Central. Le centre du détroit de Georgia est une zone centrale du détroit de Georgia. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelist/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"/>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

  <mdb:acquisitionInformation>
    <mac:MI_AcquisitionInformation>
      <mac:scope>
        <mcc:MD_Scope>

          </mcc:level>

      </mac:scope>
      <mac:instrument>
        <mac:MI_Instrument>
          <mac:identifier>
            <mcc:MD_Identifier>
              <mcc:authority>
                <cit:CI_Citation>
                  <cit:title>
                    <gco:CharacterString>Ocean Networks Canada Society</gco:CharacterString>
                  </cit:title>
                  <cit:onlineResource>
                    <cit:CI_OnlineResource>
                      <cit:linkage>
                        <gco:CharacterString>https://data.oceannetworks.ca/DeviceListing?DeviceId=22603</gco:CharacterString>
                      </cit:linkage>
                    </cit:CI_OnlineResource>
                  </cit:onlineResource>
                </cit:CI_Citation>
              </mcc:authority>
              <mcc:code>
                <gco:CharacterString>22603</gco:CharacterString>
              </mcc:code>
              <mcc:description>
                <gco:CharacterString>Local identifier for the specific device</gco:CharacterString>
              </mcc:description>
            </mcc:MD_Identifier>
          </mac:identifier>
          <mac:type>
            <gco:CharacterString>Aanderaa Oxygen Optode 4175</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:type>
          <mac:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>A dissolved oxygen sensor for OEM applications. Measurement based on the ability of selected substances to act as dynamic fluorescence quenchers. The fluorescent indicator is a special platinum porphyrin complex embedded in a gas permeable foil that is exposed to the surrounding water. A black optical isolation coating protects the complex from sunlight and fluorescent particles in the water. This sensing foil is attached to a window providing optical access for the measuring system from inside a watertight titanium housing.The foil is excited by modulated blue light, and the phase of a returned red light is measured. By linearizing and temperature compensating, with an incorporated temperature sensor, the absolute O2 concentration can be determined. Further information may be found on the BODC document server at URL: http://www.bodc.ac.uk/data/documents/nodb/119483/.</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:description>
        </mac:MI_Instrument>
      </mac:instrument>
    </mac:MI_AcquisitionInformation>
  </mdb:acquisitionInformation>
</mdb:MD_Metadata>
name: ef7a96e3-bf61-46a2-a713-efd7791c9005
notes: The Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) was deployed on 2014-09-20 at Strait of Georgia Central. Strait of Georgia Central is a central area in the Strait of Georgia. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) was deployed on 2014-09-20 at Strait of Georgia Central. Strait of Georgia Central is a central area in the Strait of Georgia. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce Aanderaa Optode 4175 (S/N 0581) a été déployé le 2014-09-20 au Strait of Georgia Central. Le centre du détroit de Georgia est une zone centrale du détroit de Georgia. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

resources.description: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments
